main_title: London's Stinky Crisis That Changed Sanitation Forever
hook: [dramatic] You won't believe this: in 1858, London was engulfed by the Great Stink! The Thames became a putrid cesspool, with raw sewage flowing into the river.
description: A stinky crisis in 1858 pushed London to improve sanitation. Discover how a foul odor changed public health! #GreatStink #LondonHistory #SanitationReform
